Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation of its unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its value and potential impact on your endeavors. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can benefit you further. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
